hours_text:
# VISITOR INFORMATION

The Beaverbrook Art Gallery is located in downtown Fredericton, New Brunswick.

## LOCATION

Visit Us

703 Queen St. Fredericton, N.B.  
E3B 1C4 Canada   
  
Come visit us at our stunning site on the banks of the historic Saint John/Wolastoq River.

## HOURS

Opening Hours

Monday   
Tuesday   
Wednesday   
Thursday   
Friday   
Saturday   
Sunday  

Closed.  
10 a.m. — 5 p.m.  
10 a.m. — 5 p.m.   
10 a.m. — 9 p.m.  
10 a.m. — 5 p.m.  
10 a.m. — 5 p.m.  
10 a.m. — 5 p.m.  

**Holiday Hours  
** December 24: 10 AM – 2 PM  
December 25: Closed  
December 26–31: 12 PM – 5 PM, Closed on Monday, December 29.  
January 1: Closed  

.  

## ADMISSION

Daily Admission Fees

Members   
Family   
Adult (25+)  
Youth 6-17  
Senior/Student   
Child Under 6  
Indigenous Peoples  

Free   
$40  
$20   
$8.50  
$14*   
Free  
Free*

*(65+/student ID/proof of status required)  

**Canada Strong Pass**  
**December 12, 2025 - January 15, 2026**  
  
Free admission for kids 17 & under  
  
50% off for youth 18–24  

## CONTACT US

Phone

**Front Desk:**

[(506) 458-2028](tel:\(506\)%20458-2028)

Email

[info@beaverbrookartgallery.org](tel:\(506\)%20458-2028)[](mailto:emailbag@beaverbrookartgallery.org)[](mailto:emailbag@beaverbrookartgallery.org)[ ](mailto:emailbag@beaverbrookartgallery.org)

Tours

[Book a private tour with a Volunteer Guide by contacting us _here_. ](mailto:education@beaverbrookartgallery.org)
